How My AI-Powered Process Works

1. AI-Assisted Evaluation & Physical Therapy

  1. Comprehensive Intake: Share your concerns and goals for therapy.
  2. AI-Assisted Movement Evaluation: I combine advanced AI analysis with hands-on clinical tests for a complete picture of your movement.
  3. Pinpoint the Cause: Identify if your issue is soft tissue, joint restriction, or movement dysfunctionâ€”not nerve injury.
  4. Advanced Treatment & Tech: The right device (shockwave, laser, EMS, etc.) plus manual therapy and education as needed.
  5. Custom Corrective Exercise Plan: You get a personalized program with feedback and ongoing support.

2. AI Movement Assessment (Wellness & Performance)

  1. 10 Functional Movement Tests: AI analyzes your movement and spots compensations, mobility limits, and weaknesses.
  2. Instant Feedback & Exercise Suggestions: Get a wellness-focused report with tailored exercise recommendations for self-improvement.

Who Benefits Most?

My methods are ideal for people with:
â€¢ Chronic muscle or tendon pain
â€¢ Sports, work, or daily activity injuries
â€¢ Muscle tightness, imbalance, or fatigue
â€¢ Poor posture or restricted mobility

Not for neurological injury or severe nerve damage (e.g. spinal cord injury, stroke, ALS).

What You Get: AI Movement Report & Custom Plan
